questions.question: What CSS function sets responsive min, ideal, and max values?
questions.explanation: clamp constrains values between minimum and maximum.

questions.question: What media feature targets high-resolution displays?
questions.explanation: resolution media queries detect pixel density.

questions.question: What container query feature adapts to parent size?
questions.explanation: Container queries respond to parent element dimensions.

questions.question: What property creates responsive aspect ratios?
What Grid value repeats columns responsively?
What unit adapts to smallest viewport dimension?
questions.explanation: vmin uses the smaller of vw or vh.

questions.question: What unit adapts to largest viewport dimension?
questions.explanation: vmax uses the larger of vw or vh.

questions.question: What property optimizes image loading per device?
questions.explanation: srcset provides different images for different screens.

questions.question: What HTML element enables responsive images?
questions.explanation: picture element serves different image sources.

questions.question: What media query logic combines multiple conditions?
questions.explanation: and operator chains media query conditions.
